byline.contributor: Anthony Shadid contributed reporting from Beirut, Lebanon; Stephen Farrell from Gaza; and David D. Kirkpatrick from Cairo.

snippet: Israel and Hamas have reached a tentative agreement on a proposal to exchange Palestinian prisoners for Gilad Shalit, an Israeli soldier who has been held since 2006.
lead_paragraph: Israel and Hamas have reached a tentative agreement on a proposal to exchange Palestinian prisoners for Gilad Shalit, an Israeli soldier who has been held since 2006.

headline.main: Israel and Hamas Agree to Swap Prisoners for Soldier
headline.print_headline: Deal With Hamas Will Free Israeli Held Since 2006
headline.seo: Israel Reaches Deal With Hamas to Free Gilad Shalit
